author: pats
msg: RIVER-361: Tidy up GetStateTest. Set a ten minute limit on final spin loop, require the aborted transaction to stay aborted, and specifically require the UnknownTransactionException.

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-2671 (OSGi Bug 100) Add new isTerminated method

author: lu4242
msg: MYFACES-2951 [PERF] enhance scanning for #{cc} expressions (discard expressions just looking for a plain cc or cc.attrs)

author: pats
msg: RIVER-361: Make TxnManagerImpl conform to TransactionManager interface by only throwing CannotAbortException for an attempt to abort a COMMITTED transaction. The change lets retries of aborts work, so GetStateTest passes.

author: tabish
msg: Add create methods for all the CMS Message types.
